title: Fifty Ways To Be Your Lover
description: How Did Matt Gallagher Love Her?With fuzzy stuffed animals and catered gourmet dinners…With fantastical origami swans…By having a maid magically appear at her door…By having a fife-and-drum corps serenade her down the street.Kate Franklin Could Only Count the Ways……that she could escape Matt's heroic assault. Her broken heart didn't need mending—especially not by the man who was her archrival! But could Kate really resist the old-fashioned romantic who was behind it all?
author: Connie Bennett
